song_name: How Many Times, How Many Lies
lyrics:
6 contributorshow many times how many lies lyricsverse 1 nicole scherzinger
people tried to tell me something
oh but i was hearing nothing
when they said you was just playing me
i didnt listen
i didnt want to
you couldnt find a blinder fool

prechorus nicole scherzinger
im here searching through the wreckage
wondering why the message never got through
and i found i misplaced all of my faith
how could i put my faith in you

chorus nicole scherzinger  carmit bachar nicole scherzinger
how many times
how many lies
how long you been sneaking
how long you been creeping around
how many lies
how many times
were you here deceiving
while i was here believing in you

verse 2 nicole scherzinger carmit bachar
i gotta put the blame on myself
shouldve known with everyone else
just knowing they knew you was just bad news
i shoulda walked out i shoulda walked out
i shoulda seen clear i shoulda seen clear
glad your sad ass is outta here
you might also likeprechorus nicole scherzinger
ive gone and thrown out all the records
all the ones that ever reminded me of you
ive gone and torn up all the pictures
cause there was not one shred of truth no oh

chorus nicole scherzinger  carmit bachar nicole scherzinger
how many times tell me tell me
how many lies how many lies
how long you been sneaking
how long you been creeping around come on and tell me
how many lies oh
how many times
were you here deceiving
while i was here believing in you

bridge carmit bachar nicole scherzinger  carmit bachar
there were so many times
there were so many lies
i dont know why i stayed
there were so many days
there were so many games
i shouldve thrown your sad ass out
but now the game is through
ill never trust in you
i finally got wise
i opened up my eyes your game is over
prechorus nicole scherzinger
ive gone and thrown out all the records
all the ones that ever reminded me of you
ive gone and torn up all the pictures yeah yeah
cause there was not one shred of truth
no no no

chorus nicole scherzinger  carmit bachar nicole scherzinger
how many times how many times
how many lies
how long you been sneaking woah oh
how long you been creeping around come on and tell me
how many lies
how many times
were you here deceiving
while i was here believing in you
how many times tell me
how many lies
how long you been sneaking how long you been sneaking
how long you been creeping around come on and tell me
how many lies
how many times
were you here deceiving were you here deceiving
while i was here believing in you

outro nicole scherzinger
whoa oh whoa oh
oh oh oh no
whoa oh yeah yeah
oh oh oh i opened up my eyes
whoa oh
ohh
yeah yeah yeahembed
